trans-unit.source: Contains data associated with an exception that occurs during the execution of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder data som er knyttet til et unntak som oppstår under utførelse av en arbeidsflytforekomst.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] When an exception occurs during the execution of a workflow instance and a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> that is associated with the workflow instance includes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> configured for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent?displayProperty=fullName>, the workflow tracking infrastructure sets <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> to an TrackingWorkflowExceptionEventArgs in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> that it sends to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Når det oppstår et unntak under kjøring av en arbeidsflytforekomst og en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>som er forbundet med arbeidsflyten forekomsten inneholder en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>konfigurert for en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent?displayProperty=fullName>, arbeidsflyten sporing infrastruktur angir <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A>til en TrackingWorkflowExceptionEventArgs i den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>som sendes til Sporingstjenesten.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > TrackingWorkflowExceptionEventArgs is used only by the runtime tracking service to pass information in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > TrackingWorkflowExceptionEventArgs brukes bare av kjøretiden sporing av service til å sende informasjon i <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: Gets the context ID of the associated activity.
trans-unit.target: Henter hjelp-IDen for den tilknyttede aktiviteten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Guid> that contains the context ID of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Guid>som inneholder Hjelp-IDen for den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName*> of the activity currently throwing the exception.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName*>til aktiviteten for øyeblikket forårsaket unntaket.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName*>

trans-unit.source: Exceptions are passed up the chain of exception handler activities.
trans-unit.target: Unntak sendes referansekjeden unntak behandlingsprogrammet aktiviteter.

trans-unit.source: An exception handler may choose to throw an exception again.
trans-unit.target: En håndterer som unntaket kan velge å iverksette et unntak på nytt.

trans-unit.source: When an exception handler throws the exception again, a new exception tracking event containing a new <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowExceptionEventArgs> is raised to the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Når en håndterer som unntak oppstår unntak på nytt, en ny unntak sporing hendelse som inneholder en ny <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowExceptionEventArgs>oppstår til kjøretiden sporing infrastruktur.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowExceptionEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: CurrentActivityPath refers to the activity that is currently throwing the exception.
trans-unit.target: CurrentActivityPath refererer til aktivitet som er for øyeblikket forårsaket unntaket.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName*> of the activity currently throwing the exception.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName*>til aktiviteten for øyeblikket forårsaket unntaket.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Exception> that is being thrown by the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref:System.Exception>som som forårsakes av arbeidsflytforekomsten.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: The exception that is being thrown by the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Unntaket som forårsakes av arbeidsflytforekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName*> of the activity that originally threw the exception.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName*>aktiviteten som opprinnelig forårsaket unntaket.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName*>

trans-unit.source: Exceptions are passed up the chain of exception handler activities.
trans-unit.target: Unntak sendes referansekjeden unntak behandlingsprogrammet aktiviteter.

trans-unit.source: An exception handler may choose to throw an exception again.
trans-unit.target: En håndterer som unntaket kan velge å iverksette et unntak på nytt.

trans-unit.source: When an exception handler throws an exception again, a new exception tracking event containing a new <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowExceptionEventArgs> is raised to the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Når en håndterer som unntak oppstår det et unntak på nytt, en ny unntak sporing hendelse som inneholder en ny <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowExceptionEventArgs>oppstår til kjøretiden sporing infrastruktur.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowExceptionEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: OriginalActivityPath refers to the activity that originally threw the exception.
trans-unit.target: OriginalActivityPath refererer til aktivitet som opprinnelig forårsaket unntaket.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName*> of the activity that originally threw the exception.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName*>aktiviteten som opprinnelig forårsaket unntaket.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.QualifiedName*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the context ID of the parent activity.
trans-unit.target: Henter context-ID på overordnet aktivitet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Guid> that contains the context ID of the parent <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Guid>som inneholder Hjelp-IDen for overordnet <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>.</xref:System.Guid>
